reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the high waist and length in legs, but they show your bulges + panty lines
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I am 5'7" tall, 130#, and wear size 4 in jeans. When clothing is real tight, I often size up, which is why I ordered these yoga shorts in size Medium. Glad I did. These shorts seem to be made of a fairly thick, good quality material. They are definitely tight. I would not have been comfortable in size Small. I love how high-waisted they are, and smoothly cover the whole belly without cutting into the waist at the top edge. I like the leg length, which seems to have approximately a 3.5" inseam. So the butt is not hanging out.What I don't like is that the part below the wide waist/belly band is a little looser, so it shows any bulges and panty lines. I probably will mainly wear these under dresses, or working out at home. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit!! Great Quality!!!
reviews.reviewText: With its high waist design, seamless construction, and flattering fit, this set of yoga shorts offers unbeatable comfort, support, and style for all your exercise needs. The high waist design of these yoga shorts provides excellent tummy control and support, allowing you to move freely and comfortably during your workouts. Say goodbye to mid workout adjustments these shorts stay in place, so you can focus on perfecting your poses and pushing your limits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Really want to love it
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what it is I wore the black one from the three and it was perfect but my blueish grey one kept ridding up my leg to my ass and rolled down my tummy area when it came to core work out day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but short
reviews.reviewText: These are a good thick and stretchy material. It is very comfortable to wear. I’m wearing a size large and they fit great. These do roll up making them even shorter so I do find myself pulling them down constantly. I would only wear these at home more like lounge shorts. The waistband is thick and has compression. These do have a small butt scrunch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes your body look banging and it’s high waisted. I wear it to longe but it’s great for workouts too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shorts fit true to size. They fabric is good quality, these shorts are squat-friendly not see-through. They are comfortable and the tummy control is awesome it smooths my midsection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shorts roll up
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and fit but the leg portion of the shorts rolls up within 15 min of wearing them. It would be a 5 star if they didn't roll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really Comfortable but REALLY short
reviews.reviewText: These shorts are really comfortable, they are made from quality fabric and are thick to the touch and yet surprisingly light when you put them on - I actually sized down one size and they stretch and fit comfortably. My only warning about them is they are really short, so while they cover everything if you do not like shorter shorts this is not the set for you!
